ContainedObjects.Name: Figurine_Custom
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
	circle = {
		color             = {0.8, 0, 0}, --RGB color of the circle
		radius            = 4.5,           --radius of the circle around the object
		show              = true,       --should the circle be shown by default?
		steps             = 32,          --number of segments that make up the circle
		thickness         = 0.1,         --thickness of the circle line
		vertical_position = 0,           --vertical height of the circle relative to the object
	}
moveTokenGridSize = 1  -- change to chosen grid size
end

function toggleCircle()
	circle.show = not circle.show
	if circle.show then
		self.setVectorLines({
			{
				points    = getCircleVectorPoints(circle.radius, circle.steps, circle.vertical_position),
				color     = circle.color,
				thickness = circle.thickness,
				rotation  = {0,0,0},
			}
		})
	else
		self.setVectorLines({})
	end
end

function getCircleVectorPoints(radius, steps, y)
	local t = {}
	local d,s,c,r = 360/steps, math.sin, math.cos, math.rad
	for i = 0,steps do
		table.insert(t, {
			c(r(d*i))*radius,
			y,
			s(r(d*i))*radius
		})
	end
	return t
end


function onPickUp(pcolor)
    createMoveToken(pcolor,self)
end

function onDrop(dcolor)
	if circle then toggleCircle() end
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

function onDestroy()
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

function destroyMoveToken(dtoken)
local dropWatch = function() return dtoken.resting end
local destroyMT = function() destroyObject(dtoken.getVar("myMoveToken")) end
Wait.condition(destroyMT,dropWatch)
end

function createMoveToken(mcolor,mtoken)
tokenExistsAlready = mtoken.GetVar("myMoveToken")
if string.match(tostring(tokenExistsAlready),"Custom") then destroyObject(tokenExistsAlready) end
tokenRot = Player[mcolor].getPointerRotation()
movetokenparams = {
image = [[http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1021697601906583980/C63D67188FAD8B02F1B58E17C7B1DB304B7ECBE3/]],
thickness = 0.1,
type = 2
}
startloc = mtoken.getPosition()
tokenScale = {x=mtoken.getBoundsNormalized().size.x/2,y=1,z=mtoken.getBoundsNormalized().size.z/2}
spawnparams =
{
type = "Custom_Tile",
position = startloc,
rotation = {x = 0, y = tokenRot, z = 0},
scale = tokenScale
}
local moveToken = spawnObject(spawnparams)
moveToken.setCustomObject(movetokenparams)
moveToken.setLock(true)
mtoken.setVar("myMoveToken",moveToken)
moveToken.setVar("measuredObject",mtoken)
moveToken.setVar("myPlayer",mcolor)
moveToken.setVar("tGridSize",moveTokenGridSize)
moveButtonParams = {
    click_function = "onLoad",
    function_owner = self,
    label = "00.0",
    position = {x=0,y=0.1,z=0},
    width = 0,
    height = 0,
    font_size =600
}
moveButton = moveToken.createButton(moveButtonParams)
moveToken.setLuaScript([[
  function onUpdate()
    local mypos = self.getPosition()
    local opos = measuredObject.getPosition()
    local oheld = measuredObject.held_by_color
    opos.y = opos.y-(Player[myPlayer].lift_height*5)
    mdiff = mypos - opos
    if oheld then
    mDistance = math.sqrt(mdiff.x^2 + mdiff.z^2)
    mDistance = math.floor(mDistance * (10/tGridSize)) / 10
    self.editButton({index = 0, label = tostring(mDistance)})
    end
  end]])

end

		vertical_position = 0,           --vertical height of the circle relative to the object
	}
moveTokenGridSize = 1  -- change to chosen grid size
end

function toggleCircle()
	circle.show = not circle.show
	if circle.show then
		self.setVectorLines({
			{
				points    = getCircleVectorPoints(circle.radius, circle.steps, circle.vertical_position),
				color     = circle.color,
				thickness = circle.thickness,
				rotation  = {0,0,0},
			}
		})
	else
		self.setVectorLines({})
	end
end

function getCircleVectorPoints(radius, steps, y)
	local t = {}
	local d,s,c,r = 360/steps, math.sin, math.cos, math.rad
	for i = 0,steps do
		table.insert(t, {
			c(r(d*i))*radius,
			y,
			s(r(d*i))*radius
		})
	end
	return t
end

end

	if circle then toggleCircle() end
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

end

function createMoveToken(mcolor,mtoken)
tokenExistsAlready = mtoken.GetVar("myMoveToken")
if string.match(tostring(tokenExistsAlready),"Custom") then destroyObject(tokenExistsAlready) end
tokenRot = Player[mcolor].getPointerRotation()
movetokenparams = {
image = [[http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1021697601906583980/C63D67188FAD8B02F1B58E17C7B1DB304B7ECBE3/]],
thickness = 0.1,
type = 2
}
startloc = mtoken.getPosition()
tokenScale = {x=mtoken.getBoundsNormalized().size.x/2,y=1,z=mtoken.getBoundsNormalized().size.z/2}
spawnparams =
{
type = "Custom_Tile",
position = startloc,
rotation = {x = 0, y = tokenRot, z = 0},
scale = tokenScale
}
local moveToken = spawnObject(spawnparams)
moveToken.setCustomObject(movetokenparams)
moveToken.setLock(true)
mtoken.setVar("myMoveToken",moveToken)
moveToken.setVar("measuredObject",mtoken)

    opos.y = opos.y-(Player[myPlayer].lift_height*5)

    self.editButton({index = 0, label = tostring(mDistance)})

if string.match(tostring(tokenExistsAlready),"Custom") then destroyObject(tokenExistsAlready) end
tokenRot = Player[mcolor].getPointerRotation()
movetokenparams = {
image = [[http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1021697601906583980/C63D67188FAD8B02F1B58E17C7B1DB304B7ECBE3/]],
thickness = 0.1,
type = 2
}
startloc = mtoken.getPosition()
tokenScale = {x=mtoken.getBoundsNormalized().size.x/2,y=1,z=mtoken.getBoundsNormalized().size.z/2}
spawnparams =
{
type = "Custom_Tile",
position = startloc,
rotation = {x = 0, y = tokenRot, z = 0},
scale = tokenScale
}
local moveToken = spawnObject(spawnparams)
moveToken.setCustomObject(movetokenparams)
moveToken.setLock(true)
mtoken.setVar("myMoveToken",moveToken)
moveToken.setVar("measuredObject",mtoken)
moveToken.setVar("myPlayer",mcolor)
moveToken.setVar("tGridSize",moveTokenGridSize)
moveButtonParams = {
    click_function = "onLoad",
    function_owner = self,
    label = "00.0",
    position = {x=0,y=0.1,z=0},
    width = 0,
    height = 0,
    font_size =600
}
moveButton = moveToken.createButton(moveButtonParams)
moveToken.setLuaScript([[
  function onUpdate()
    local mypos = self.getPosition()
    local opos = measuredObject.getPosition()
    local oheld = measuredObject.held_by_color
    opos.y = opos.y-(Player[myPlayer].lift_height*5)
    mdiff = mypos - opos
    if oheld then
    mDistance = math.sqrt(mdiff.x^2 + mdiff.z^2)
    mDistance = math.floor(mDistance * (10/tGridSize)) / 10
    self.editButton({index = 0, label = tostring(mDistance)})
    end
  end]])

end

function onLoad()
	circle = {
		color             = {0.8, 0, 0}, --RGB color of the circle
		radius            = 3.05,           --radius of the circle around the object
		show              = true,       --should the circle be shown by default?
		steps             = 32,          --number of segments that make up the circle
		thickness         = 0.1,         --thickness of the circle line
		vertical_position = 0,           --vertical height of the circle relative to the object
	}
moveTokenGridSize = 1  -- change to chosen grid size
end

function toggleCircle()
	circle.show = not circle.show
	if circle.show then
		self.setVectorLines({
			{
				points    = getCircleVectorPoints(circle.radius, circle.steps, circle.vertical_position),
				color     = circle.color,
				thickness = circle.thickness,
				rotation  = {0,0,0},
			}
		})
	else
		self.setVectorLines({})
	end
end

function getCircleVectorPoints(radius, steps, y)
	local t = {}
	local d,s,c,r = 360/steps, math.sin, math.cos, math.rad
	for i = 0,steps do
		table.insert(t, {
			c(r(d*i))*radius,
			y,
			s(r(d*i))*radius
		})
	end
	return t
end


function onPickUp(pcolor)
    createMoveToken(pcolor,self)
end

function onDrop(dcolor)
	if circle then toggleCircle() end
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

function onDestroy()
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
	circle = {
		color             = {0.8, 0, 0}, --RGB color of the circle
		radius            = 4.5,           --radius of the circle around the object
		show              = true,       --should the circle be shown by default?
		steps             = 32,          --number of segments that make up the circle
		thickness         = 0.1,         --thickness of the circle line
		vertical_position = 0,           --vertical height of the circle relative to the object
	}
moveTokenGridSize = 1  -- change to chosen grid size
end

function toggleCircle()
	circle.show = not circle.show
	if circle.show then
		self.setVectorLines({
			{
				points    = getCircleVectorPoints(circle.radius, circle.steps, circle.vertical_position),
				color     = circle.color,
				thickness = circle.thickness,
				rotation  = {0,0,0},
			}
		})
	else
		self.setVectorLines({})
	end
end

function getCircleVectorPoints(radius, steps, y)
	local t = {}
	local d,s,c,r = 360/steps, math.sin, math.cos, math.rad
	for i = 0,steps do
		table.insert(t, {
			c(r(d*i))*radius,
			y,
			s(r(d*i))*radius
		})
	end
	return t
end


function onPickUp(pcolor)
    createMoveToken(pcolor,self)
end

function onDrop(dcolor)
	if circle then toggleCircle() end
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

function onDestroy()
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

function onLoad()
	circle = {
		color             = {0.8, 0, 0}, --RGB color of the circle
		radius            = 4.5,           --radius of the circle around the object
		show              = true,       --should the circle be shown by default?
		steps             = 32,          --number of segments that make up the circle
		thickness         = 0.1,         --thickness of the circle line
		vertical_position = 0,           --vertical height of the circle relative to the object
	}
moveTokenGridSize = 1  -- change to chosen grid size
end

function toggleCircle()
	circle.show = not circle.show
	if circle.show then
		self.setVectorLines({
			{
				points    = getCircleVectorPoints(circle.radius, circle.steps, circle.vertical_position),
				color     = circle.color,
				thickness = circle.thickness,
				rotation  = {0,0,0},
			}
		})
	else
		self.setVectorLines({})
	end
end

function getCircleVectorPoints(radius, steps, y)
	local t = {}
	local d,s,c,r = 360/steps, math.sin, math.cos, math.rad
	for i = 0,steps do
		table.insert(t, {
			c(r(d*i))*radius,
			y,
			s(r(d*i))*radius
		})
	end
	return t
end


function onPickUp(pcolor)
    createMoveToken(pcolor,self)
end

function onDrop(dcolor)
	if circle then toggleCircle() end
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

function onDestroy()
    destroyMoveToken(self)
end

mtoken.setVar("myMoveToken",moveToken)
moveToken.setVar("measuredObject",mtoken)
moveToken.setVar("myPlayer",mcolor)
moveToken.setVar("tGridSize",moveTokenGridSize)
moveButtonParams = {
    click_function = "onLoad",
    function_owner = self,
    label = "00.0",
    position = {x=0,y=0.1,z=0},
    width = 0,
    height = 0,
    font_size =600
}
moveButton = moveToken.createButton(moveButtonParams)
moveToken.setLuaScript([[
  function onUpdate()
    local mypos = self.getPosition()
    local opos = measuredObject.getPosition()
    local oheld = measuredObject.held_by_color
    opos.y = opos.y-(Player[myPlayer].lift_height*5)
    mdiff = mypos - opos
    if oheld then
    mDistance = math.sqrt(mdiff.x^2 + mdiff.z^2)
    mDistance = math.floor(mDistance * (10/tGridSize)) / 10
    self.editButton({index = 0, label = tostring(mDistance)})
    end
  end]])

end
